title: Commuters' choice, Forest Hills/Arboretum, bright and comfortable
posting_body: A bright and comfortable space to enjoy yourself with a home office or share with others.
BEAT THE HIGH PRICES OF JAMAICA PLAIN

Great condition, sunny, easy walk to Forest Hills, close to JP, birds and flowering trees of Arnold Arboretum, Rozzie sq., Brookline, Boston, Needham, Dedham, Convenient to Boston Longwood Medical Hospitals, VA
Bedrooms spaced apart for privacy, Large Living Room.
Eat in kitchen, back porch
Hardwood floors and tiles, no carpet, energy efficient gas heating system and newer windows, free  washer and dryer (Laundry) as well as extra space.
The back yard is a great place to entertain and grill.
Parking on the street is available and requires no parking permits.
The neighborhood is diverse and friendly.
1 cat considered, NO dogs or birds
Rent does not include utilities.
Move in costs: 1st month, security deposit.
Good credit and references.
Well maintained, professionally managed.
Responsible landlord.
10 minutes to the Jamaica Pond, minutes to Arnolds, Near Jamaica Plain , Brookline , Boston, Needham, Dedham
SHOWING daily
Convenient to Boston Longwood Medical, Hospitals, VA
Video available.
Easy showing.
Rent is calculated if occupied by 3 residents, each additional $200 extra.
3 br.
voucher accepted.
Please email your specific circumstance: (why are you moving, how many people would be living in the apartment, budget, etc) AND times that you are available to see the apartment.
